name: 20 Diamond Goalie Loco Mesh
description: 20 Diamond Goalie Loco Mesh is the perfect wax mesh for goalies. Since Loco Mesh is not effected by elements it will always allow you to clear the ball like you do on a sunny day. Loco Mesh also gives goalies that very much needed hold when bringing the ball up field. Loco mesh gives you the hold you need without gripping the ball due to the mesh being sticky. The mesh is smooth allowing for a very smooth release and crisp, accurate passes.

name: American/Stars and Bars Mesh
description: American mesh is the prefect way to express the love we show for our country and our heroes. American Mesh starts from red at the top, to white, to blue.

Red Stringing Kit (strings are red only)

name: Color Fade to White Loco Wax Mesh
description: This is a piece of Loco wax mesh dyed with a certain color that is half colored half white.

name: Custom Loco Wax Mesh String Job
description:
A mesh pocket strung with our high quality Loco Mesh.
http://m.youtube.com/user/BrutoandtheLocos
We offer these colors for mesh: Red, Blue, Green, Grey, Black, any other colors I do not have will cost $5 extra. If you purchase a fade please specify what color you would like the fade to be. if you order a two color specify what two colors. If you would like a custom piece please contact me on my website under the contact tab.
Send your unstrung head, pocket preferences, shooter setup, return name, and address to:
 
M. A. Astore
10511 Judicial Drive, Suite 109
Fairfax, Virginia 22030

Email me at Brutoandthelocos@gmail.com if you have any questions about your order or any special requests. Also if you would like a piece of mesh that is not white, like a fade, full colored or a custom piece.

name: Loco Mesh
description: Loco Mesh was made up of a special blend of waxes to improve a player's game to the fullest, and it is the solution for playing in all elements. Loco Mesh offers everything a lacrosse player would need, allowing for amazing pockets, perfect channels, and excellent hold. Loco Mesh is extremely easy to stretch due to it's softness, making Loco Mesh less complicated to string. While stringing the head little to no flaking will occur. The mesh holds it's shape perfectly once strung. We carry two different sizes of mesh, 15 millimeter and 20 milimeter. 20 milimeter offer a little bit more hold. the diamonds are larger so there is more traction on the ball. 15 milimeter has standerd sized diamonds. the diamonds are smaller giving a smoother overall release and less whip. http://m.youtube.com/user/BrutoandtheLocos
